# Agenda

-	Monday morning
    - General introduction (Simon)
    - Introduction to machine learning (Adit)
    - Intro ML exercise: [R notebook][introML_R]|[Python notebook][introML_P]
    - Open project discussion (all participants)
- Monday afternoon
    - Introduction to convolutional neural networks (Savanna)
    - Image segmentation (Husile)
    - CNN exercise: [R notebook][CNN_R]|[Python notebook][CNN_P]
    - Project work (groups)
- Tuesday morning
    - Introduction to Natural Language Processing methods (Simon)
    - NLP exercise: [R notebook][NLP_R]|[Python notebook][NLP_P]
    - Project work (groups)
- Tuesday afternoon
    - General MAGIC project discussion (incl. Patagonia field trip)
    - Trip to [Gilbert Geologic Park][gilbert]
- Wednesday morning
    - Possible: Unsupervised methods or discussion on data sources
    - Project work (groups)
    - Workshop wrap-up
